parameters.content:
## ü§ñ PromptRefiner - Transform Basic Prompts into Professional AI Prompts
### üéØ What This Does
Automatically converts simple user prompts like *"write a blog post"* into structured, professional AI prompts with metadata, variables, and clear instructions. Perfect for content creators, developers, and businesses wanting to eliminate prompt engineering guesswork.
### ‚ö° Quick Demo
**Input**: "Create a marketing strategy"  
**Output**: "Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for a [business_type] targeting [target_audience]. Include market analysis, channel selection, budget allocation, timeline, and KPIs. Focus on [primary_goals] and consider [constraints]."
### üîÑ How It Works
1. **Google Sheets Trigger** monitors for new prompts
2. **AI Enhancement Pipeline** uses Gemini + Groq to add structure & context  
3. **Field Completion** auto-generates missing metadata (topic, categories)
4. **Quality Assurance** validates & stores complete results
### üöÄ Setup Requirements
- **AI APIs**: Gemini, Telegram, Groq API keys
- **Google Sheets**: 2 sheets (Main, ModifiedPrompt)
- **5 minutes setup time** - detailed instructions in blue sticky notes
### üìä What You Get
‚úÖ Enhanced prompts with clear structure  
‚úÖ Extracted input variables for reusability  
‚úÖ Topic classification and categories  
‚úÖ Professional improvement notes  
‚úÖ Complete audit trail in Google Sheets
### üé¨ Perfect For
- Content creation workflows
- AI chatbot prompt optimization  
- Marketing copy enhancement
- Technical documentation prompts
- Educational prompt examples
---
üí° **Ready to transform your prompts?** Follow the setup steps in the white notes below! ‚¨áÔ∏è

## üõ†Ô∏è STEP-BY-STEP SETUP GUIDE
### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Create Google Sheets (5 minutes)
Create a new Google Spreadsheet with 2 tabs:

**üìäMain Sheet** (Input prompts):
- Columns: Original Prompt ID | Model | Original Prompt | Last Updated | Created Time


**üìùModified Prompt Sheet** (Results):
- Columns: Modified Prompt ID | Original Prompt ID | Topic | Topic Categories | Modified Prompt | Prompt Title | Prompt Type | Model Used | Improvement Notes | Updated Time | Created Time | isProcessed
### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Configure n8n Credentials
Add these in **Settings > Credentials**:
- Gemini API credential
- Telegram API credential  
- Groq API credential
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credential
### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Update Workflow Settings
- Replace ALL Google Sheets node **Document IDs** with your spreadsheet ID
- Update **Chat ID** in Telegram node (optional notification)
- Test API connections in each AI Chat node
### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Test Your Setup
1. Add test prompt to Main sheet: "Explain machine learning"
2. Run workflow manually
3. Check ModifiedPrompt sheet for results
4. Monitor Logging sheet for any errors

‚úÖ **Setup complete!** Your workflow will now process prompts automatically every minute.

## üîÑ WORKFLOW FLOW EXPLAINED
### üì• **INPUT STAGE**
**Google Sheets Trigger** ‚Üí **Loop Over Items** ‚Üí **ProcessController**
- Processes one prompt at a time to prevent overload
- Sets up global variables for execution tracking
### ü§ñ **AI ENHANCEMENT STAGE** 
**ExecutionController** ‚Üí **PromptModifier (AI Agent)** ‚Üí **Parse AI Chat**
- **Gemini / Groq AI** analyzes and enhances basic prompts
- **Smart parsing** extracts JSON data with 3 fallback methods
### ‚úÖ **QUALITY ASSURANCE STAGE**
**isMissingFields** ‚Üí **Finalize Data** ‚Üí **Create/Update Google Sheets** ‚Üí **Telegram Notification**
- **Validates** all required fields are complete and accurate
- **Formats** final data structure for storage
- **Stores** enhanced prompt with full metadata
- **Notifies** user via Telegram with result summary
### üõ°Ô∏è **ERROR HANDLING**
- **Execution limits** prevent infinite loops (max 3 OPM)
- **Graceful fallbacks** handle API failures and parsing errors

=‚ùå **PromptRefiner Processing Failed**

**Prompt ID**: {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Original Prompt ID'] }}
**Original Prompt**: "{{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Original Prompt'].substring(0, 80) }}..."

üîÑ **Issue**: Maximum retry attempts reached (3/3)
üí° **Reason**: AI agents couldn't complete all required fields after multiple attempts

**What happened:**
Our system tried 3 times to enhance your prompt but encountered persistent issues with field completion. This might be due to:
‚Ä¢ Complex or unclear original prompt
‚Ä¢ AI service temporary limitations
‚Ä¢ Missing context information

**Next steps:**
‚úÖ Try rephrasing your prompt more clearly
‚úÖ Check if your prompt has sufficient detail
‚úÖ Wait a few minutes and try again
‚úÖ Contact support if issue persists

üìã **Check your Google Sheets Logging tab for detailed error information**

‚è∞ **Failed at**: {{ $now.toFormat('HH:mm') }}

conditions.leftValue: ={{ (!$json["Original Prompt ID"] || !$json["Topic"] || !$json["Prompt Title"] || !$json["Topic Categories"] || !$json["Prompt Type"] || !$json["Improvement Notes"]) &&  ($json["Operation Counts"] <= 2) }}

parameters.content:
## üîß CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
### üé® **Modify AI Behavior**
- **Change AI prompts**: Edit system messages in ExecutionController nodes
- **Custom enhancement logic**: Update Code nodes with your rules
### üìä **Add Custom Fields**
- **Custom validation**: Modify field checking logic  
- **Extended output**: Add columns to Google Sheets + parsing logic
### ‚öôÔ∏è **Performance Tuning**
- **Retry limits**: Change MAX_OPM_COUNTS (default: 3)
- **Processing speed**: Adjust polling interval in Google Sheets Trigger
- **Batch size**: Modify Loop Over Items batch settings
---
## ü©∫ TROUBLESHOOTING
### ‚ùå **Common Issues**
- **"Workflow keeps running infinitely"**  
‚Üí Check Eorkflow's logs for stuck executions, disable Loop Over Items temporarily

- **"AI agent returns ERROR responses"**  
‚Üí Verify API credentials, check rate limits, review system prompts

- **"Missing fields not generated"**  
‚Üí Ensure EmptyFieldsExtractor code matches your field names exactly

- **"Google Sheets sync issues"**  
‚Üí Refresh OAuth tokens, verify spreadsheet permissions
### üìã **Debug Checklist**
‚úÖ All API credentials valid and connected  
‚úÖ Google Sheets Document IDs updated correctly  
‚úÖ Spreadsheet has all 2 required tabs with correct column names  
‚úÖ Test prompts added to Main sheet follow the expected format  
### üí° **Performance Tips**  
- Monitor API usage to avoid rate limits
- Set up error alerts via Telegram notifications
- Regular cleanup of old execution logs
---
üÜò **Still stuck?**
Contact Me:
- Gmail: eocimreo@gmail.com !
- Discord: https://discordapp.com/users/1227720935268814961
- Whatsapp: +13155751505
- Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/phuluongphuong/

## üìö REAL EXAMPLES & RESULTS
### üéØ **Content Creation Example**
**Input**: `"Write a blog post about AI"`
**Enhanced Output**:
```
Create a comprehensive blog post about [ai_topic] targeting [target_audience]. 
Include: 1) Introduction with current AI trends 2) Core concepts explained 
in accessible language 3) Real-world applications and case studies 4) 
Future implications 5) Call-to-action for readers. Tone: [writing_tone], 
Length: [word_count] words.
```
**Generated Metadata**:
- **Topic**: "Artificial Intelligence Content Creation"
- **Categories**: "Technology, Content Marketing, AI Education"  
- **Type**: "Creative"
---
### üíº **Business Strategy Example**  
**Input**: `"Help me create a marketing plan"`
**Enhanced Output**:
```
Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy for [business_type] launching 
[product_service]. Include market analysis, competitor research, target 
audience segmentation, channel strategy, budget allocation, timeline, 
and success metrics. Focus on [primary_goals] within [timeframe] budget.
```
**Generated Metadata**:
- **Topic**: "Strategic Marketing Planning"
- **Categories**: "Business Strategy, Marketing, Planning"
- **Type**: "Analysis"
---
### üí° **Try These Sample Prompts**
- "Explain machine learning to beginners"
- "Create a workout routine"  
- "Write Python code for data analysis"
- "Plan a social media campaign"
- "Design a customer survey"

Each gets transformed into a structured, professional prompt with reusable variables! üöÄ
